name: Daisy Chain (Keywarn, John-Hollingworth, sarthur202, Hannes, Lisa Blackwell, Ben_Mullenger)
name_original: Daisy Chain (Keywarn, John-Hollingworth, sarthur202, Hannes, Lisa Blackwell, Ben_Mullenger)
description:
(You may need to click the game window to capture the cursor, you can press Esc to get it back...)

Try to get daisy back in her basket without wrecking the china shop!

This game was made as part of the Climax Studios Game Jam and we have been raising money for Mind, a mental health charity. You can donate here:

https://www.justgiving.com/fundraising/climaxgamejam

Credits

Ben - Programming

Charlie - Programming

Hannes - Programming / VFX

John - Design

Lisa - Art

Sarah - Art
